title: Critical Agent Loading System Failures
description: HierarchicalAgentLoader fails to load Python agents due to relative import issues. All 6 system agents (pm_agent, documentation_agent, system_init_agent, version_control_agent, ticketing_agent) fail to load with "attempted relative import with no known parent package" errors.

technical_details.error_pattern: attempted relative import with no known parent package

recommended_fixes: Replace relative imports with absolute imports in all agent files
Implement proper module context handling in _analyze_agent_file()
Add comprehensive error handling for import failures
Implement agent loading fallback to profile-based instruction loading
business_impact: Complete failure of Python agent instantiation, framework relies on profile-based loading as fallback

testing_evidence.test_results: All 5 agent types failed to load: system_init, pm, documentation, ticketing, version_control
error_log_patterns: WARNING: Failed to analyze agent file
